Issue.creator: jyellick
Issue.summary: As a fabric developer, I need the cclifecycle package to utilize both the old and new chaincode package formats.
Issue.description: The cclifecycle package has an interface which enumerates installed chaincodes. Presently, this depends on a concrete implementation which queries the filesystem directly. Like with the core/chaincode package, we need a shim which will first query the new package repository, and the chaincode does not exist in the new repo, check the old.
